Document: #Don't quit a head role without notice. Don't quit a head role without notifying your chain of command or an admin. - If you do not want to play a role, do not opt-in for it. - Command roles help drive rounds. If you need to leave, use cryo or please admin-help your role and that you are leaving. - There is no need to wait for a reply when admin-helping that you need to disconnect as a head role.
